Module buralotech.identifier.core
Package com.buralotech.oss.identifier.uuid

Class UUIDVersion6Delegate

java.lang.Object
com.buralotech.oss.identifier.uuid.UUIDVersion6Delegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
UUIDVersionDelegate
public class UUIDVersion6Delegate extends Object implements UUIDVersionDelegate
Encapsulates the logic that is specific to the standard type 6 UUID format.
